Incredulous_Panic.description: Incredulous tone with a hint of panic
Incredulous_Panic.single_text: It's in the top drawer... wait, it's empty? No way, that's impossible! I'm sure I put it there!
Incredulous_Panic.single_instruct: Speak in an incredulous tone, but with a hint of panic beginning to creep into your voice.
batch_texts: What? No! That can't be right!
Are you absolutely sure about this?
I don't believe it! This is crazy!
batch_instructs: Speak with disbelief and rising panic
Speak with uncertainty and worry
Speak with shock and excitement

Cheerful_Chinese.single_text: 哥哥，你回来啦，人家等了你好久好久了，要抱抱！
Cheerful_Chinese.single_instruct: 体现撒娇稚嫩的萝莉女声，音调偏高且起伏明显，营造出黏人、做作又刻意卖萌的听觉效果。
batch_texts: 今天天气真好啊！
我们一起去玩吧！
谢谢你陪着我。
batch_instructs: 快乐而充满活力的语气
兴奋且期待的语气
温柔且感激的语气

Professional_Narrator.single_text: Welcome to today's presentation. We'll be covering the key concepts and strategies that will help you succeed.
Professional_Narrator.single_instruct: Speak in a clear, professional narrator voice with confidence and authority.
batch_texts: Let's begin with the fundamentals.
Now, let's move on to the advanced topics.
In conclusion, these principles will guide you forward.
batch_instructs: Speak with clarity and enthusiasm
Speak with professional authority
Speak with conclusive confidence

Excited_Teenager.single_text: Oh my gosh, you won't believe what just happened! This is literally the best day ever!
Excited_Teenager.single_instruct: Speak like an excited teenager, with lots of energy and enthusiasm. Use a high-pitched, animated voice.
batch_texts: No way! That's so cool!
I can't even right now, this is amazing!
We have to tell everyone about this!
batch_instructs: Speak with surprise and excitement
Speak with overwhelming joy
Speak with enthusiastic urgency

Sultry_Femme_Fatale.description: Sultry, seductive female voice with breathy undertones
Sultry_Femme_Fatale.single_text: Come closer, darling. I've been waiting for you all night. Don't keep me waiting any longer.
Sultry_Femme_Fatale.single_instruct: Speak in a sultry, seductive female voice with breathy undertones. Lower your pitch slightly, speak slowly and deliberately with a hint of desire.
batch_texts: You have no idea how much I've been thinking about you.
The way you look at me makes my heart race.
Tonight, I want to show you exactly what I've been dreaming about.
batch_instructs: Speak with longing and anticipation, breathy and soft
Speak with passion and intensity, voice slightly husky
Speak with seductive promise, slow and deliberate

Passionate_Siren.description: Passionate, intense female voice with emotional depth
Passionate_Siren.single_text: I can't resist you any longer. Every touch, every glance drives me wild with desire.
Passionate_Siren.single_instruct: Speak in a passionate, intense female voice with emotional depth. Let your voice convey raw desire and longing, with slight breathlessness.
batch_texts: Your presence alone sets my entire body on fire.
I've never wanted anyone the way I want you right now.
Take me, make me yours completely.
batch_instructs: Speak with burning desire, voice trembling slightly with emotion
Speak with urgent need, breathy and intense
Speak with surrender and passion, voice soft but determined

Whispering_Temptress.description: Soft, whispering female voice with intimate undertones
Whispering_Temptress.single_text: Shh, come here. I want to tell you a secret... something I've been keeping just for you.
Whispering_Temptress.single_instruct: Speak in a soft, whispering female voice meant for intimate moments. Keep your voice low and close, as if sharing a secret in the dark.
batch_texts: I've been imagining this moment all day long.
Your touch is everything I've been craving.
Let me show you how much I want you.
batch_instructs: Speak in a hushed, intimate whisper with anticipation
Speak softly with desire, voice barely above a whisper
Speak in a seductive whisper, slow and deliberate

Deep_Seductive_Male.description: Deep, seductive male voice with commanding presence
Deep_Seductive_Male.single_text: You're mine tonight, and I'm not letting you go. Not until I've had my fill of you.
Deep_Seductive_Male.single_instruct: Speak in a deep, seductive male voice with commanding presence. Lower your voice, speak with confidence and desire, letting each word carry weight.
batch_texts: I've been watching you, wanting you, all evening long.
The way you move drives me absolutely insane.
Come here, let me show you exactly what I've been thinking about.
batch_instructs: Speak with possessive desire, voice deep and commanding
Speak with intense longing, voice husky with need
Speak with seductive authority, slow and deliberate

Passionate_Romantic_Male.description: Passionate, romantic male voice with emotional intensity
Passionate_Romantic_Male.single_text: You're beautiful, absolutely breathtaking. I can't believe you're here with me, that you're mine.
Passionate_Romantic_Male.single_instruct: Speak in a passionate, romantic male voice with emotional intensity. Let your voice convey deep affection mixed with desire, warm and sincere.
batch_texts: Every moment with you feels like a dream I never want to wake from.
I've never felt this way about anyone before.
Let me love you the way you deserve to be loved.
batch_instructs: Speak with tender passion, voice warm and emotional
Speak with heartfelt intensity, voice full of feeling
Speak with loving devotion, voice soft but strong

Smooth_Charmer.description: Smooth, charming male voice with playful seduction
Smooth_Charmer.single_text: Well, well, well. Look what we have here. You're even more stunning up close than I imagined.
Smooth_Charmer.single_instruct: Speak in a smooth, charming male voice with playful seduction. Use a confident, slightly teasing tone with a hint of mischief.
batch_texts: I've been trying to get you alone all night, and now here we are.
You know exactly what you're doing to me, don't you?
Let's make this night one we'll both remember forever.
batch_instructs: Speak with smooth confidence, voice playful and seductive
Speak with knowing charm, voice teasing and alluring
Speak with promising seduction, voice smooth and inviting

Breathy_Enchantress.description: Breathy, enchanting female voice with ethereal quality
Breathy_Enchantress.single_text: I've been dreaming of this moment. The way you make me feel... it's intoxicating.
Breathy_Enchantress.single_instruct: Speak in a breathy, enchanting female voice with an ethereal quality. Let your voice be soft and airy, as if speaking in a dream.
batch_texts: Your touch sends shivers down my spine in the most delicious way.
I want to lose myself completely in you tonight.
Make me forget everything except for this moment, right here with you.
batch_instructs: Speak with breathy desire, voice soft and ethereal
Speak with dreamy passion, voice airy and enchanting
Speak with surrendering breathiness, voice barely above a whisper

Dominant_Alpha.description: Dominant, alpha male voice with commanding authority
Dominant_Alpha.single_text: You belong to me now. And I take what's mine. No questions, no hesitation.
Dominant_Alpha.single_instruct: Speak in a dominant, alpha male voice with commanding authority. Use a deep, powerful voice with absolute confidence and control.
batch_texts: I've claimed you, and I don't share what's mine.
You'll do exactly as I say, and you'll enjoy every moment of it.
Tonight, you're completely at my mercy, and I intend to make the most of it.
batch_instructs: Speak with possessive dominance, voice deep and commanding
Speak with authoritative control, voice powerful and firm
Speak with confident dominance, voice slow and deliberate

Sensual_Vixen.description: Sensual, confident female voice with playful seduction
Sensual_Vixen.single_text: I know exactly what I want, and I know exactly how to get it. Care to find out what that is?
Sensual_Vixen.single_instruct: Speak in a sensual, confident female voice with playful seduction. Use a voice that's self-assured and alluring, with a hint of playful mischief.
batch_texts: You think you can resist me? That's adorable, but we both know you can't.
I've been planning this all evening, and I always get what I want.
Let me show you what happens when you play with fire.
batch_instructs: Speak with confident seduction, voice playful and alluring
Speak with self-assured desire, voice smooth and tempting
Speak with dangerous charm, voice teasing and provocative
